message.entry: Expected IMAGESIZE to be a vector of two or more elements.
Expected INLIER_POINTS1 and INLIER_POINTS2 to have the same number of rows.

An epipole may be located inside of an image. The epipoles are located at [{0},{1}] in I1 and [{2},{3}] in I2, but the specified imageSize was [{4},{5}]. Severe distortion may result if T1 or T2 are used to transform these images. See isEpipoleInImage for more information.
